WorkflowInfo.Name: Create snapshot on a list of virtual machines
WorkflowInfo.Description: Create snapshot on a list of virtual machines
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:VMCreateSnapshot;Assembly=VMCreateSnapshot, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:ReadXLS Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="0" RecoveryWorkflowID="0" HostName="localhost" DisplayName="Read Excel" IsValid="True" HostId="1" Path="c:\Servers.xls" TypeName="ReadXLS" RecoveryGotoActivity="{x:Null}" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="readXLS1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="" Description="Read excel file" RecoveryRetryTimes="0" RecoveryReturnMessage="{x:Null}" RecoveryRetryTimesNextSelection="0" /><ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="0" RecoveryWorkflowID="0" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RecoveryRetryTimes="0" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." RecoveryGotoActivity="{x:Null}" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryRetryTimesNextSelection="0" TypeName="GetRowsCount" RecoveryReturnMessage="{x:Null}" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns2:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="0" RecoveryWorkflowID="0" RecoveryRetryTimes="0" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" DisplayName="Exit While" Description="Exit current while activity" RecoveryGotoActivity="{x:Null}" RecoveryRetryTimesNextSelection="0" TypeName="ExitWhile" RecoveryReturnMessage="{x:Null}" /><ns3:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" RecoveryWorkflowID="0" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RecoveryRetryTimes="0" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." RecoveryGotoActivity="{x:Null}" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="0" RecoveryRetryTimesNextSelection="0" DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" RecoveryReturnMessage="{x:Null}" /><ns4:VMCreateSnapshot Password="" SnapshotDescription="Before installing Win2008 SP1" RecoveryMethodSelection="0" RecoveryWorkflowID="0" VMName="%ServerName%" HostName="vCenter" DisplayName="VM Create Snapshot" RecoveryRetryTimesNextSelection="0" IsValid="True" PauseDiskWrites="False" SnapshotName="Before 2008 SP1 Installation" x:Name="vmCreateSnapshot1" TypeName="VMCreateSnapshot" HostId="-2" TimeInSeconds="0" RecoveryGotoActivity="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="" Description="Create a snapshot of the virtual machine" RecoveryReturnMessage="{x:Null}" RecoveryRetryTimes="0" MemoryStateDump="True" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
